name: Spatium
description:
Spatium is a psychedelic puzzle game about fitting tetris-like pieces…

  • Grab pieces and drop them on the board
  • Click on pieces that are already on the board to remove them

Soundtrack (Uncompressed): https://soundcloud.com/rodel-bixo/spatium

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Navigate through the menu
  • Mouse - Grab and Drop the pieces
  • Escape - Go back or quit the game
  • Alt+Enter - Toggle Fullscreen
  • S - Toggle Shake
  • Ctrl+F3 - Reload Assets (This also duplicates de music, so you can have some fun with it)
